This Doujinshi can easily be mistaken as Netorare cause of the last 3 pages and I can see why. Since this doujinshi only focuses on the MC(the teacher) it does not apply to Netorare cause it only focuses on the MC, if it was Mika's Husband's POV then it would or if it started with Him and Mika in the first pages and/or if Mika is being stolen/taken away by force, but it showed us that after the MC separated with them, Mika came back and did it on her own will, the MC did nothing and even knew that she was about to be married, the MC was just listening to Mika's request and accepted her request. And Mika is a bonified slut cause she was turned into one by the MC and also MC is a scum. And what happened to the other characters(Aoi, Himeno, and Satsuki) afterwards?. Overall I'll give this a 7.5/10
